name: Tower
summary: Nearly fifty years ago, a gunman rode the elevator to the twenty-seventh floor of the University of Texas Tower and opened fire. TOWER, an animated and action-packed documentary, shares the untold story of that day - when the worst in one man brought out the best in so many others.
info:
• 中文名: 校塔枪击案
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: 塔楼
  • 上映年度: 2016
  • 片长: 96分钟
  • 官方网站: www.towerdocumentary.com
